channel.title: Added my server to list, didn't get login and password to confirm...Now what?
channel.description:
I had to shut down my computer, and stupidly forgot to save the login details to confirm the server. Anyway how do I get the details back, or reset them? It won't let me re-add the server to the list, because it's already been added and is awaiting verification. Gah.
Anyone?

item.title: Added my server to list, didn't get login and password to confirm...Now what?
item.dc:creator: @Sovereign Sovereign
item.description:
@Sovereign wrote:

Alright thanks a lot man .

item.title: Added my server to list, didn't get login and password to confirm...Now what?
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

To my knowledge, if your server isn’t approved in 24 hours it will be removed and you can re-add it. Also, questions like this should be posted here in the future.

Read full topic
